results.title: Lisinopril Preserves Physical Resilience and Extends Life Span in a Genotype-Specific Manner in Drosophila melanogaster.
results.journal: J Gerontol A Biol Sci Med Sci
results.text_hl: We show that genotypes with increased physical performance on @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ treatment experienced reduced @<m>DISEASE_Protein_Aggregation_Pathological</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D066263 @@@age-related protein aggregation@@@ in muscle.

citations.NLM: Gabrawy MM, Campbell S, Carbone MA, Morozova TV, Arya GH, Turlapati LB, Walston JD, Starz-Gaiano M, Everett L, Mackay TFC, Leips J, Abadir PM. Lisinopril Preserves Physical Resilience and Extends Life Span in a Genotype-Specific Manner in Drosophila melanogaster. J Gerontol A Biol Sci Med Sci. 2019 Nov 13;74(12):1844-1852. PMID: 31197356
